items.title: Trump-linked Truth Social seeks SEC approval for two crypto ETFs

items.title: Dutch House of Representatives advances controversial 36% tax law
items.summary: Certain assets, like equity in a qualifying start-up company and physical property used for non-investment, were exempt from the 36% tax.

items.title: Bitcoin bulls blitz $69K as retail traders pressure short positioning
items.summary: Bitcoin rallies above $69,000 as retail traders apply pressure to short positions and aim to generate a lasting bullish trend change.

items.summary: Bitcoin's rebound from $60K lows may be a dead cat bounce, as the daily charts scream caution and prediction markets price in more pain.

items.summary: Bitcoin and Ether rebounded modestly as ETF outflows mounted, while BlackRock entered DeFi and Binance completed its $1 billion Bitcoin reserve shift.

items.title: Executive Leadership Update
items.summary: Today, we are announcing a transition in the executive leadership team at the Ethereum Foundation. After extensive contributions to the Foundation’s mission and operations, Tomasz Stańczak has decided to step down from his role as Co-Executive Director. The Foundation’s Board has appointed Bastian Aue to serve as interim Co-Executive Director,...

items.title: An update from Tomasz
items.summary: tl;dr I am stepping down from my co-ED role at the EF at the end of February 2026. Bastian Aue is taking over the co-ED role alongside Hsiao-Wei. The future is bright for builders, for Ethereum, for the EF, and for me....
